bibl.title: Territory of Washington v. Walker et al. Subpoena
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image.

org.orgName: United States District Court For The Western District of Washington Northern Division

div1.p: I hereby certify that I received the within Subpoena on the 21st day of July 1885 and that I order service by reading and exhibiting the same to the within named witness Mrs Whitten at her residence in Tacoma Pierce County Washington Territory this 21st day of July A.D. 1885
Lewis Byrd Sheriff of Pierce County
Sheriffs fees reading to one Witness 3:4 Mileage 4 miles 40/809

In Justice Court. ______________________
Territory of Washington Plaintiff, vs.
Ma Walker et al, .Defendants.
Received the within Subpoena on the 21st day of July 1885, and served the same on the 21st day of July 1885 on E.A. Sherman by reading the same to him
Lewis Byrd Sheriff of Pierce County W.T. By A.A. Lows Deputy
Sheriffs Fees, To Serving Subpoena "Mileage 2 mils
